data.description:
Take to the range with an incredible arsenal of the worldâ€™s finest weaponry. Gun Club 3 combines challenging, addictive gameplay with stunning visuals & unsurpassed detail; the only thing missing is the smell of gun powder.
 
The newest release in the best-selling Gun Club series, Gun Club 3 brings a whole new world of excitement to the most popular gun simulator ever.

UNPARALLELED REALISM
Highly detailed interactive 3D weapon models that are fully operational & feature real-world ballistics.

ADVANCED CUSTOMISATION
Custom-fit your weapons with hundreds of different attachments. From scopes to lasers to grenade launchers, the picatinny rail system allows for any load-out you can imagine. 

INTERACTIVE RANGES
Fire your weapons in a multitude of different range scenarios, from hostage rescue to long distance marksman to the dreaded zombie apocalypse. And for true shooting purists there is the classic target range. No time limits, no scores, just you and your weapon.

Go update now live!

changelog.change_log:
- Added GearVr Controller Support
- Added Customizable Button Mapping

---- 11 new WWII era weapons

---- All new Allied-themed range
---- Hundreds of new events to challenge you 
---- Careful, new live-targets will shoot back!

- Revised configuration for unknown controllers.
- Added persistent Fire mode setting
- P90 Attachment system bug fixed

- Added Controller Recognition for more controllers. 
- Included a fallback configuration for unknown controllers.

- Added Controller Support for Officially supported Controllers ( + some unoficially supported ones too)
- UI Prompts for touchpad and controller use (whichever is most recently active)
- In-Range Controls Help Menu updated for controllers ( From Pause Menu)
- Controller Help screen added to Options Panel in the Lobby
- Added Tutorial for In-Range "Look Down" Menu for fire mode and grenade launcher use.
- Enabled trigger fire using bumpers (for controller without triggers)
- Fixed unshootable targets for 3 events (SMG and Rifle)

- Updated Controller support
- Recognizes controller syncing issues and compensates accordingly
- Enables touchpad operation while controller is in use
- Bug Fix to speed up firing from the A button
- In-Range "Look Down" menu to use grenade launcher (if attached) and change fire mode (if applicable)

Volume Control Added
Quality Settings 4xMSAA
Shader Bug fix for weapons and reflective surfaces
Exit To Oculus Home prompt (Now available from Title screen also)
Manifest Alterations and removal of unused permissions
Game Load Error detection and Backup Restoration
Changed Texture Compression to ASTC
Frame Rate Optimizations
Added Texture Filtering option to reduce Flicker/Moire
Third layer backup redundancy added

Volume Control Added
Quality Settings 2xMSAA
Shader Bug fix for weapons and reflective surfaces
Exit To Oculus Home prompt (Now available from Title screen also)
Manifest Alterations and removal of unused permissions
Game Load Error detection and Backup Restoration
